## validMoves() function

Get an array of valid moves for the specified color player moving the top tile at the specified coordiante.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function validMoves(board: GameBoard, color: Color, coordinate: HexCoordinate): HexCoordinate[];
```

**Returns:**

[HexCoordinate](./hive-lib.hexcoordinate.md)<!-- -->\[\]

An array of coordinates indicating valid destinations for the tile being moved by the specified player.

## Remarks

Note that it is possible for a player to move tiles that are not their own color using the pillbug.
